name: Friday Night Funkin': V.S. Whitty - Definitive Edition
summary: While strolling with your Girlfriend though an alleyway, you happen to notice an ominous glow coming from around the corner. Out steps Whitmore (Whitty), a hot-headed underground rock star who happens to have some beef with your Girlfriends parents. Think you've got what it takes to get him outta there?

videos.name: Trailer
